selectors.reasoning: The main content appears to be contained within 'div.guide-content', which has the '.doc' and '.article' classes indicating it is the primary documentation. Site navigation is in the header, sidebar 'div.guide-sidebar' with 'nav.pds-side-nav-compact' links, and footer - these should be excluded from crawling. In-page anchor links use the '.docs-header-anchor' class and should be excluded from crawling but kept for accessibility analysis of the main content area.
